Question: In November 2006, this person began filming his next project, Rob Reiner's The Bucket List, a role for which he shaved his head.
Hints: This person lived next door to Marlon Brando for a number of years on Mulholland Drive in Beverly Hills.
This person has twice won the Academy Award for Best Actor, for One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest and for As Good as It Gets.
Seeing his talent as an artist, they offered this person a starting level position as an animation artist.
